entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, described as having red hair and a scar on his face. (Excerpt: 'Next to the tall kid with the red hair.' and 'Did you see his face?' and 'Did you see his scar?')

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school with many staircases and doors. (Excerpt: 'There were a hundred and forty-two staircases at Hogwarts:')

relationships.description: People are staring at Harry as he walks through the corridors. (Excerpt: 'People queuing ou tside classrooms stood on tiptoe to get a look at him, or doubled back to pass him in the corridors again, staring.')
Harry is attending Hogwarts school. (Excerpt: 'There were a hundred and forty-two staircases at Hogwarts:')
